pageContent: Objective: To characterize men presenting to a tertiary care safety-net hospital with prostate-specific antigen (PSA) values ≥100 ng/mL and to identify a potential population for targeted PSA screening.

metaData.source:
Detection of intact prostate cancer cells in the blood of men with prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/9187695/
